SHOWING_COMMENTS: Showing <%= Number((page - 1) * count).toLocaleString() %> - <%= Number(((page - 1) * count) + comments.length).toLocaleString() %>
CONFIRM_REMOVAL_MESSAGE: Are you sure you want to delete this comment?
RESET_FLAG_MESSAGE: Are you sure you want to reset the flag count on this comment?
RESET_FLAG_NOTE: This will not affect users who have flagged this comment.
BAN_USER_MESSAGE: How would you like to ban this user?
ANONYMOUS_COMMENT_NOTE: This is an anonymous comment. No email or account is available to ban.
DELETE_ALL_COMMENTS_LABEL: Delete All of <%= comment.commenterName ? comment.commenterName : 'Anonymous' %>'s comments.
BAN_DELETES_COMMENT_NOTE: Banning this user will also delete this comment.
NO_COMMENTS_MESSAGE: Looks like you don't have any comments yet.
NEEDS_REVIEW_NOTE: Note: New comments by admins or moderators will not show up under "Needs Review".
